Carga data: 

```{r}
load("data_distrital.Rda")
```

```{r}
id=read.csv("ID MAPAS DISTRITAL.csv")
```

```{r}
data_distrital$TXUBIGEOPROVINCIA = as.factor(data_distrital$TXUBIGEOPROVINCIA)
str(data_distrital$TXUBIGEOPROVINCIA)
```

```{r}
id$TXUBIGEO=ifelse(nchar(id$TXUBIGEO)==5, paste0(0,id$TXUBIGEO),id$TXUBIGEO)
```

```{r}
id$TXUBIGEO= as.factor(id$TXUBIGEO)
str(id$TXUBIGEO)
```

```{r}
data_distrital=left_join(id[c(4,5)], data_distrital)
```

```{r}
data_distrital=data_distrital[-c(21,57,39)]
```


```{r}
save(data_distrital, file = "data_distrital.rda")
```
